name: Flipworld
description:
This is a game I made in godot live on my Twitch in just 4 hours. The current 0.1 build is what I made with no frills. I will be doing more streams over the coming week to add more things to the project.

Controls

A/Left arrow/left on joystick = left

D/Right arrow/right on joystick = right

spacebar/'A' on xbox controller (or equivalent) = jump

shift/'X' on xbox controller (or equivalent) = switch gravity

source code here

the art assets used are in the Pixel art Metroidvania asset pack by o-lobster
